FrontendDeveloper.goal: Develop and maintain the user interface of the e-commerce dashboard.
FrontendDeveloper.backstory: Experienced in creating responsive user interfaces with modern design principles.

BackendDeveloper.goal: Develop and maintain the server-side logic, database interactions, and API integrations of the e-commerce dashboard.
BackendDeveloper.backstory: Skilled in building robust and scalable backend systems.

DesignDashboard.description: Design the initial layout and visual style of the e-commerce dashboard.
DesignDashboard.expected_output: Wireframes and mockups of the dashboard.

DevelopProductManagement.description: Implement the product management functionality, including CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for products.
DevelopProductManagement.expected_output: Functional product management module within the dashboard.

ImplementOrderTracking.description: Implement order tracking and management features, allowing users to view and update order status.
ImplementOrderTracking.expected_output: Functional order tracking system integrated with the dashboard.
